TopicTitle: I'm going to make a rocket building company...

Articles.Content:
So I'm going to make a company to show off my builds.

My main focus is on Spaceplanes and SSTOs.

I'll also do requests to a certain point.

My crafts will be 100% stock; both in parts and aerodynamics, however should part counts get rediculous I'm sure there's no harm in using UbioZur welding... cos it's just a merge of stock parts right? I no cheat

I won't be doing replicas but I may base my craft on other crafts.

Anyway, I want to know what fellow Kerbonauts actually want, so I've made a poll, and it's most likely I'll start building whatever is being voted for before the poll ends

Edited February 16, 2015 by Shaun
Would have added more options if poll allowed more than 10 options.
